name: Accordion
description: Extend the default collapse behavior to create an accordion. It requires both id and group for this to work.

options.name: id
options.description: You need to provide id for both <collapse> and <collapse-toggle> elements, so accordion knows which element to open.

options.name: group
options.description: You need to provide group for both <collapse> and <collapse-toggle> elements, so accordion knows which elements to hide in the same group.
